title: fantado LED Battery Operated Flameless Tea Light Candles - Warm White (12 Pack) by PaperLanternStore

Shop PaperLanternStore for Lanterns, Wedding Decor, PaperLanternStore coupons and more. Premium Quality, Selection and Service.
description: There are few things more mesmerizing than the simple beauty that comes from a burning candle. The intrinsic shortcomings of a burning flame, however (cost, hassle, fire hazard, etc.), lead to the search of other options in soft lighting decor. Our 12-packs of LED "tea lights" are the economical, safe, and attractive alternative to the annoyance of dealing with life flames. We offer our 12 packs of LED candles with white bases in four different flame colors: cool white, warm white, blue, red, or amber. Powered by an included high capacity Lithium battery, you can enjoy the continual use of 24 hours of light. Simply flip on the switch, and these lights will emit a natural flickering light. For decorating, try pairing these lights with any of our tea light holders, hurricane lanterns, table top lanterns, or explore the wedding decoration section for more ideas. Just as elegant sitting alone in the middle of a table as they are placed in a vase, covered with glass beads, these versatile lights let your designs breath with unencumbered freedom for under $1.00 apiece. For re-use, you can purchase extra batteries from our store. More candle colors available: cool white, warm white, blue, red, or amber. Please see entire selection of LED Battery Operated Tea Light Candles . Dimensions: 1.5"D x 1.5"H Quantity: 12 individual lights Battery Required : 3x LR1130 (Included)
